import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Canvas } from "@react-three/fiber"; import { Stars } from "@react-three/drei"; import { Physics } from "@react-three/cannon"; import PlaneOne from "../Box/PlaneOne"; import "../App.css"; import { Player } from "../Box/Player"; import { useBox } from "@react-three/cannon"; import { Html } from "@react-three/drei"; import "./Instruction.css"; import "./Texts.css"; //const errorObj = require("../Data/data"); const errorObj = [ { description: `

SAURABH SINGH 😎

MERN STACK DEVELOPER

I am Saurabh Kumar Singh who is at present looking for job in web

development and software development industry. Strong professional

with a Master’s Degree (M.C.A focused in software development from

Institute of Engineering and Technology, Lucknow, Uttar-Pradesh).


I am looking forward to work with the organization. This unambiguously

would provide me an opportunity to further explore my knowledge and skills.

`, position: [-9, 3, -22], rotation: `Math.PI / 1, 1.5, 3.1` }, { description: `

EDUCATION 🎓

Masters of Computer Application

Institute of Engineering & Technology, Lucknow Utter- Pradesh

2017 - 2021

Bachelors of Science •May 2017

' Dr. Rammanohar Lohia Avadh University”, Ayodhya Uttar-Pradesh.

2014 - 2017


`, position: [8, 3, -15], rotation: `Math.PI / 1, 4.6, 3.1` }, { description: `

Projects

Meta Game Fantasy (M G F)

Meta Game Fantasy is the gaming application in founded on a solidarity game, special competitons, and formats.

Working on backend Node.js, Express is used for the server & postgres, postgres create schema and data modeling

Gas-O-Line

{" "} Gas-O-Line is the webApp provides monthly subscription gas at low prices.

{" "} Drilling for oil and gas production in Texas,Nevada, New Mexico Alaska and Louisiana

Working on backend Node.js, stripe payment gateway for subscription. API for creating user, product and webhook implementation

Personal Projects

Memories(mern)

{" "} Development using technologies like React with Javascript, Material UI, CSS3 Managed application state with Redux{" "}

{" "} For back end Node.js, Express is used for the server & MongoDB, Mongoose create schema and data modeling

E-commerce

{" "} Front end UI development using technologies Using React.js, redux, and Firebases. LinkedIn Clone Front end{" "}

`, position: [22, 4, -11], rotation: `Math.PI / 1, 3.1, 3.1` }, { description: `

4 WEEKS

{" "}
`, position: [22, 2, 11], rotation: `Math.PI / 1, 0, 3.1` }, { description: `
